Parallels.ab: sraōtā.mōi mərəždātā.mōi ~ VrS65.70 sraōtəmca marždikəmca yazamaide

Nerangs.ab: yə̄ səuuištō ... mōi ādāi kahiiāicīt̰ paitī. srišāmrūtīg gōwišn pad harw paitī hōm ud urwarām bē afšārišn skūrag andar mayān hōm pālā nihišn rāspīg bē sar čahār angust abar gīrišn ō dast ī hōy ī zōt barišn ǰīwdān abar sar ī zōhr nihišn

"yə̄ səuuištō ... mōi ādāi kahiiāicīt̰ paitī. He has to recite (this stanza) three times. At each paitī, he has to strain the hōm and urwarām. He has to put the bowl on the middle of the hōm pālā. The rāspīg has to take it with four fingers and bring it to the left hand of the zōt. He has to place the ǰīwdān on the top of the zōhr."
yə̄ səuuištō ... mōi ādāi kahiiāicīt̰ paitī. sē bār guftan ud harw bār pad paitī hōm ud urwarām ī kōftag afšārdan
"He should recite yə̄ səuuištō ... mōi ādāi kahiiāicīt̰ paitī three times. Each time, at paitī, he should strain the crushed hōm and urwarām."
